duties_responsibilities.duty: Create realistic 3D environments using Raytrace rendering and strong lighting techniques.
Model and texture 3D assets in Max, Maya, or Blender for use in the Unity Game Engine.
Utilize a combination of pre-rendered and real-time assets to create visually stunning environments.
Work collaboratively with the team to push the limits of visual fidelity on mobile devices.
Demonstrate passion for plants, landscaping, and design in the development of game environments.
Contribute to the creation of dazzlingly real environments for players to interact with and share.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Digital Art, Computer Animation, or related field (Master's preferred)
